column2: Allowing users to specify environment variables in their embedded terminal sessions

column3: I've added the environment variables dialog to the Embedded Terminal Settings. Any macro variables in the values are expanded. This provides a hook for passing in things like the PROJECT_DIR (IDEA-126640), IDEA_HOME (IDEA-134992), and anything else the user might want. I settled on PROJECT_DIR as the default because I wanted it myself, it seemed like a good example to show what users could do with the dialog, and it seemed it would provide a good base for a lot of tricks users might dream up.

Have you submitted a contributor license agreement? If not, please download the PDF from http://www.jetbrains.org/display/IJOS/Contributor+Agreement and then print it out, sign (mention you github account name there), scan and email to contribute@jetbrains.com
The agreement was received. Thank you.
I've merged the pull request. @sblundy Thanks!
